param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: page_title
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Show/Hide the pages Title

param.name: header
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page. If left blank, the Menu name will be used instead

param.name: other_cat_section
param.label: Category List - Section
param.description: Show/Hide the List of Categories in List view page

param.name: other_cat
param.label: Category List - Category
param.description: Show/Hide the List of Categories in Table view page

param.name: cat_description
param.label: Category Description
param.description: Show/Hide the Description for the list of other catgeories

param.name: cat_items
param.label: # Category Items
param.description: Show/Hide the number of items in each category

param.name: description
param.label: Description
param.description: Show/Hide the Description below

param.name: description_text
param.label: Description Text
param.description: Description for page

param.name: image
param.label: Image
param.description: Image for page, must be located in the /images/stories folder. Default will load web_links.jpg, No image will mean an image is not loaded

param.name: image_align
param.label: Image Align
param.description: Alignment of the image

param.name: headings
param.label: Table Headings
param.description: Show/Hide the Table Headings

param.name: name
param.label: Name Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Feed Name column

param.name: articles
param.label: # Articles Column
param.description: Show/Hide the # of articles in the feed

param.name: link
param.label: Link Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Feed Link column

param.name: feed_image
param.label: Feed Image
param.description: Show/Hide the image of the feed

param.name: feed_descr
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show/Hide the description text of the feed

param.name: item_descr
param.label: Item Description
param.description: Show/Hide the description or intro text of an item

param.name: word_count
param.label: Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item description text. 0 will show all the text
